name: getRooms
shortDescription: Returns all room IDs and one or all translations
description: This method returns all room IDs and one or all translations.

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: A lower case ISO 639-1 language and upper case ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code seperated by a dash.

returnValue: Returns an Array<Struct> with all rooms on success. When languageCode is specified each Array element is a Struct with two entries: The ID of type Integer and NAME of type String. If the specified translation is unknown an empty String is returned. When languageCode is not specified each Array element is also a Struct with two entries: The ID of type Integer and TRANSLATIONS of type Struct with the language code as key and the name as value.
